About

Hi, I'm DotDev. A self taught front-end web developer and freelancer based in Norway. I'm fluent in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript along with various frameworks and libraries. Clean code and a keen eye for mobile first design, and user experience help me create a perfect balance between functionality and attractiveness.
